{{Lang|'''Yokoyama'''|ja=横山|ja_rm=Yokoyama}} is an open-world [[NPC]] located in [[Ritou]], [[Inazuma]]. He stands guard in front of the [[Hiiragi Clan]] Estate.

===Appearance===
Yokoyama wears a standard uniform modeled from the {{Lang|''ashigaru''|ja=足軽}} of feudal Japan. He wears a purple-gray ''shitagi'', lavender ''kobakama'', white socks, and ''waraji'' sandals. His eggplant-colored armor with pale gold accents consists of ''dou'' (breastplate) with the [[Inazuma Shogunate]]'s crest, ''kote'' (armored sleeves), ''haidate'' (thigh guards), and ''sune-ate'' (greaves). He is equipped with a ''juumonji yari'' (cross-shaped spear), whose shaft is lavender colored, and contains the Shogunate crest under the spearhead.

==Dialogue==
===Dialogue Set #1===
''Available before completing [[Omnipresence Over Mortals]].''
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Yokoyama:''' Do you need something, outlander?
:{{DIcon}} What is this place?
::'''Yokoyama:''' This is a key site of the Kanjou Commission, not a place an outlander such as yourself should visit.
::'''Yokoyama:''' If you wish to seek an audience with the [[Hiiragi Shinsuke|Kanjou Commissioner]], then you should go to the [[Outlander Affairs Agency]] and hand in your letter and name card.
::'''Yokoyama:''' As for whether you can see the Commissioner... I'd say it's up to luck.
:{{DIcon}} Goodbye...
::'''Yokoyama:''' Hmph... Whatever.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Dialogue Set #2===
''Available after completing [[Omnipresence Over Mortals]].''
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Yokoyama:''' Hi, can I help you?
:{{DIcon}} What is this place?
::'''Yokoyama:''' This is a key site of the Kanjou Commission, the center of management for all of Ritou.
::'''Yokoyama:''' If there is something you want to see the Clan Head for... I'm afraid you have come at a bad time.
::'''Yokoyama:''' No one can see the Clan Head before [[Raiden Shogun|Her Excellency the Ogosho]] makes a judgement.
:{{DIcon}} Goodbye...
::'''Yokoyama:''' Bye.
{{Dialogue End}}
